Silence::

She made a quick silent prayer that the Matrix help her with this. 
SHe then started studying the diognostic scans. "Hmmmm, odd. Well,
that cancels out that theory. But perhaps, hmmm, I wonder...." as she
muttered aloud to herself.  She took up two cables and plugged then in
to Nightlight's communicator panel just under her chin.  "OK, now hear
this. I am Silence. One of several Maximals in this room.  I am aware
of your presence. I wish to communicate with you. How do you wish to
be addressed and give me your origins as well.  Communication is best
when all parties invovled understand one another. We wish you no harm,
we only want to have our friend back in one peice and alone in her own
body. Please speak with us." she had said this in a soft tone.  But
hoped it worked.  Her optics never left from her gaze of Nightlight. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> "I'm afraid that it's inside.  It will require open spark surgery to 
> reach it."  Kenzo explained.
> 
> OOC: I'm really just making this up as go along.  Is there anything 
> planned for where we're going with all of this?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Dark Mouse" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Disreguard last post. 
> > 
> > Silence:  
> > She looked at Kenzo, then to the monitors. "ah, well, I can see 
> this
> > won't be easy. But perhaps.......uh, is the parasite physically in 
> her
> > spark? Or is it energy beams moving around inside it?"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > "The med bay is this way."  Kenzo lead Silence to the Maximal's
> > > medical facility where (I suppose) Nightlight was being 
> detained. 
> > > Several moniters were keeping track of her stats.
> > > 
> > > "The alian life form I'm afraid has infested her spark."  He 
> explained
> > > motioning to a moniter that showed her spark on it.  
> > > "It will take delicate work to remove it without causing damage 
> to
> > > Nightlight."
> > >
